page.title: 04The Western Gazette.Yeovil.
page.content: {South Somerset's major newspaper media {publisher.}When we got to the Western Gazette we talked to the reporters.We found out that the Chief Reporter had been working there for 24 years.Another of the reporters said that it was great fun working there.{The paper started in {1737 as the Sherborne and Dorset {Mercury.}In 1744 it combined with the Sherborne Flying Post.At one time they used an old fashioned type writer but now they use computers.They sell{63000 {copies each week.}The Western Gazette is sold in 5 counties in England.We looked at a Western Gazette that was 100 years old.News in 1885 included a dispute about Afghanistan and the resignation of Primeminister Gladstone.In 1985 the stories are much more local.The company has 250 workers.
